mapper.select: SELECT workType, workNo, workName, zl.spec, zl.unit, "元" AS rentUnit, zl.changePrice, zl.price, zl.priceNoTax, (zl.price-zl.priceNoTax) AS tax, zl.qty, zl.contrTrrm, zl.contractSum, zl.contractSumNoTax, zl.contractSumTax AS contractTax, changeQty, zl.alterTrrm, changeContractSum, changeContractSumNoTax, changeContractSumTax AS changeContractTax, zi.signThisAmt AS thisQty, zi.thisAmt, zi.thisAmtNoTax, zi.thisAmtTax, zi.upQty, zi.upAmt, zi.upAmtNoTax, zi.upAmtTax, zi.totalQty, zi.totalAmt, (zi.thisAmtNoTax + zi.upAmtNoTax) AS totalAmtNoTax, (zi.thisAmtTax + zi.upAmtTax) AS totalAmtTax, zl.taxRate, (SELECT isDeduct FROM zx_ct_supplies_shop_settlement_list WHERE del_flag = '0' and zx_ct_supplies_shop_settlement_id = zs.billID) AS isDeduct, zi.remarks AS remark FROM zx_ct_supplies_lease_res_settle_item zi left join zx_ct_supplies_contr_lease_list zl on zi.detail_list_id = zl.zx_ct_supplies_contr_lease_list_id left join zx_ct_supplies_lease_res_settlement zs on zi.mainID = zs.zx_ct_supplies_lease_res_settlement_id where zi.del_flag = '0' and zs.billID = #{zxCtSuppliesLeaseSettlementListId,jdbcType=CHAR}
